input.sentences: it was such a nice fall day that i decided to go for a hike .
i was surprised to come across this peaceful pier where i took a break .
the variety of flowers still out this late in the season was nice to see .
this tree particularly caught my attention because it is amazing how it can be so skinny yet so tall .
what a great day i had on my hike and now for a beautiful sunset .
output.sentences: I went on a nice hike during the fall.
I was surprised to find a pier, but it was so peaceful I had to stop for a moment.
The colors created a nice variety of sights in all directions, which is my favorite part about this season.
When I left the pier I headed to tall, skinny tree.
Behind the tree I could see the sunset, which was a beautiful ending to my day hike.
